summary: changes Karliah\'s boots into Thieves Guild boots
descriptionHtml:
==========
Description
==========
I\'ve never liked the look of the farm clothing in Skyrim, and I\'ve never liked that Karliah\'s boots are just farm boots. So I\'ve finally decided to do something about it. This mod will change Karliah\'s Boots use the Thieves Guild boots mesh.

================
and Gloves version
================
---requires Better Thieves Guild Gloves---
This will not only change Karliah\'s boots, but also change her gloves to Thieves Guild gloves, specifically, my \"Better Thieves Guild Gloves.\" Basically, it adds the mesh of the vanilla thieves guild gloves on top of her farm gloves.

Better Thieves Guild Gloves can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22217

==========
Installation
==========
\"Download with manager\" and activate
or...
drag contents of file into your Data folder

============
Uninstallation
============
Deactivate in NMM
or...
delete \"Better Karliah Boots.esp\"/\"Better Karliah Boots and Gloves.esp\"

============
Compatibility
============
Will be incompatible with anything that alters Karliah\'s Boots/Gloves or the thieves guild boots/gloves
(other than Better Thieves Guild Gloves)

======
Credits
======
Bethesda for making Skyrim and the CK
Me for making Better Thieves Guild Gloves

Enjoy!!
author: Hatwig
